features: ⭐Elegant Design⭐ Anzon Mories Original Designer Artwork Butterfly Stationery Paper Set of 48 Pieces LINED Writing Letter Papers + 24 Pieces Pink Envelops with butterfly lining

⭐Printer-friendly & Luxurious Quality⭐ The premium quality stationary paper is compatible with both inkjet and laser printers and also good with fountain pen or gel pen without bleeding and ghosting. Luxury quality with a moderate price.
⭐Glue-Free Envelope⭐ Absolutely gorgeous Banker Style Envelop includes self-sealing glue on the edge of the lip. Save your time and perfect to mail your letter with this Envelope.

⭐Dimension⭐ College Rule Stationery Paper: 8 1⁄2 X 11 Inch with 27 lb / 100gsm heavy weight paper, Envelopes: 8.75 x 4.75 Inch with 32lb/120gsm perfect for mailing. You have plenty of room that perfectly fit in up to 6 stationery papers in one envelope and also a greeting card.

⭐Ideal Gift for Kids Families or Friends⭐ This colorful 8.5" x 11" paper is perfect for creating your own invitations, announcements and personal messages. Writing a warm word to a friend or family is the best way to bond your relationship. Warm greetings, sincere blessings, and party banquets can all be achieved with this stationery set.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Favorite Choice Anzon Mories butterfly stationary paper and envelope set are widely used as hand writing message for warming greeting, wedding invitation, cuisine menu, gift blessing, party banquets, etc.

Elegant Design Exclusive original designer artwork. The front side has border, letterhead, and lines. The back side has colorful butterflies. Printer Friendly The stationary set is made of premium uncoated paper material, which fully compatible with laser or inkjet printers. Self-Sticking Flap Super convenient and save your time to send your letter or mail your message easily.
Dimension & Material Report 27lb / 100gsm heavy weight stationery papers (Lined) x 48 sheets32 lbs/ 120 gsm extra weight envelopes x 24 piecesWriting paper: 8.5” x 11”Envelope: 8.75” x 4.75”

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Granddaughter loved it!
reviews.reviewText: My 9 year old granddaughter had been invited to become a pen pal with a 2nd cousin of hers. They have not met and she was a little hesitant. We didn't want to push her but let her make up her mind. I bought this for an extra Xmas present for her and she really liked it and decided to write the cousin. The lines made a really neat letter and she loved the design. I told her that in the future if she runs out of paper I'll buy her more. It was a good purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One sided, lined, cute ❤
reviews.reviewText: I love this stationary. Paper is thick and my inks don't bled through!! Inspires me to write creatively ❤💖💜

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Envelopes are large enough to put sticker packs inside. I use it to write my 6 year old granddaughter. I love the butterfly design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not packaged well at all
reviews.reviewText: The stationary is pretty but was not packaged with anything to keep it from bending, not even a hard piece of cardboard. Pack it proper and get 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful High Quality Stationery.
reviews.reviewText: Lovely high quality paper. Heavy enough to write on both sides. The color was exactly as described in the butterfly with multicolored and beautiful. I was very pleased, and I will buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have not used it yet but looking forward to writing mysister a special letter on it . The lines will make it mucheasier to use ;the pink color and floral pattern add to theappeal of this stationery ! The art of "snail" mail and cursive writing should not becompletely lost due to all the modern technology .( JMO )Looking forward to using other patterns from thiscompany ! I feel sure special holiday patterns will beavailable . Thank you ! Donna , Daisy , & Ivie ☺☺☺

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my mom for Christmas because she loves to write and I know she well love it

reviews.reviewerName: Love this product, best utensils I have ever bought
reviews.reviewTitle: Could only find it on amazon
reviews.reviewText: Liked the product , used it to write to my 5 yr old great niece , so we can be penpals

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The paper and envelopes are of good quality paper and the butterfly design is very pretty, if you or your family and friends like butterflies they will love receiving your notes on this pretty stationary. The Seller ensured it arrived on time and it was in excellent condition upon arrival. Highly recommend this product and seller.
Le papier semble bien mais 1 étoile en moins car le plastique qui l'entoure fait un peu sale

reviews.reviewerName: Very nice and soft but the front pocket was to small to carry my phone.
reviews.reviewText: I loved the colorful pages and matching envelopes. Little to small to write much but always the back to use and extra pages.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have just received this item so haven't used it yet but it is absolutely stunning. The paper is really good quality. The colour & design is stunning. Excited to use it will definitely purchase from this company again 😊
